channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Lisa's first run goes south in a hurry; two rookies raise the stakes in the dash for the cash; Hugh Alex and Rick Yemm leave Alaska behind to take on some of the most remote and deadliest roads on the planet.

channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Hugh and Rick roll deeper into the Canadian outback; an overflow may leave Alex stranded; Dave's training run with Tony reaches the boiling point; Lisa goes on a rescue mission; Maya takes her first look at the haul road.

channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Dave's hot temper may cost him his second and final shot; Maya fights to prove she belongs behind the wheel; Tony visits the scene of the accident that nearly cost him everything; Lisa gets a shot to redeem last year's biggest failure.

channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Hugh and Rick haul the biggest load ever on the Canadian ice roads; Alex fights a massive oil leak; two Dalton newcomers finally head up the highway; Dave Redmon is finally alone in the truck.
